name: transaction failed
description:
This was made for #LudumDare50 with bitsy.

a story about being queer in a capitalistic world.

a story about escaping a convenience store. (where you can only trust the employees.)

a story about yellow. about its past, present and future.

try to find an exit or the store will close down and you will be forever alone. 

play with arrow keys. to get the full experience try to interact with every highlighted object! if you don't know how to go on: move around the edges of the rooms :)

KNOWN ISSUES:

- it can be confusing sometimes, where to go next! 

content warning: transphobia, queerphobia, nausea
